Constructor Detail

InfoTable

public InfoTable(String tableId,
                 String modelCode,
                 Date aDate)
Constructor for creating an info table object based on the information stored in the database

Parameters:
tableId - The info table ID to be read from the database
modelCode - The info model code
aDate - The time of the request (Currently not used)
Method Detail

addCSVRow

public void addCSVRow(String csv)
Adds a new row to the Info table from a CSV String.

Parameters:
csv - The row content in CSV format. The fields in the CSV string must correspond by type and position to the attributes of the Info Model.

addNameValueRow

public void addNameValueRow(String[] nameValues)
Adds a new row to the Info table from a name/value array.

Parameters:
nameValues - One dimensional array of name/value pairs. The names must correspond to the attribute names of the Info Model.

addRow

public void addRow(String[] values)
Adds a new row to the Info table from a string array.

Parameters:
values - String array of column values. The fields in the array must correspond by type and position to the attributes of the Info Model.

getRow

public InfoRow getRow(com.conceptwave.scripting.Integer row)
Gets a table row by row index

Parameters:
row - Row number
Returns:
InfoRow object or null if the row does not exists NOTE: Every time it returns a new instance of InfoRow wrapper for the row.
It is recommended to keep the InfoRow object once it is obtained
